https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/owutg7PpHuy82Gu9C0awXqcsEJ2.jpg Inspired by an exclusive interview and performance footage of Chavela Vargas shot in 1991 and guided by her unique voice, the film weaves an arresting portrait of a woman who dared to dress, speak, sing, and dream her unique life into being.
